short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that lets you know when a page is using WebGPU

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension that puts an icon in your browser which lights up when a page is using WebGPU and offers some simple stats about it's usage (How many adapters have been requested, how many devices, etc.)

Unlikely to be useful for anyone outside of the Chrome GPU team.
